document_data.name: Stone House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stone House''' was a large stone building in [[Shadowdale (town)|Shadowdale]] used to store food for the local businesses.
document_data.Structure: Typical food stuffs stored within included: wheat and [[corn]] flour.
